name: Benchmark
headline: The trusted AI platform for investment firms
description: Benchmark is the trusted AI platform for investment firms. Today, leading firms use Benchmark to screen deals, extract insights from unstructured data, and automate workflows. Our platform combines cutting-edge AI with deep industry expertise to help investment firms make smarter, faster decisions across their entire deal lifecycle.

founders.name: Alec Dunn, Founder
founders.description: Alec spent 5+ years working for one of the largest real estate investors in the world and is now on a mission to change how private market investors utilize their data.

The trusted AI platform for investment firms
Smarter, faster decisions across your entire deal lifecycle.
Backed by 
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66ffbc039e91e1eacf266911/670aa7855c11f13918478f23_ycombinator.svg)
[Book a demo](https://withbenchmark.com/<https:/calendly.com/alec-benchmark/benchmark-intro>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66ffbc039e91e1eacf266911/670296ea13f019757269a7d8_Logomark.png)
Benchmark is an AI-powered workspace built for investment firms. Accelerate your diligence process and automate repetitive tasks across your entire deal lifecycle in a single platform.
# Turn mountains of data into deal-winning insights
Benchmark instantly processes any files (Excel, PDFs, call transcripts, and more)—regardless of size. Transform raw data into clear, actionable insights tailored to your needs. Save time and uncover key data points faster than ever before.
[Book a demo](https://withbenchmark.com/<https:/calendly.com/alec-benchmark/benchmark-intro>)
# AI you can trust
Verify insights instantly. Each AI output comes with quickly verifiable citations, combining unmatched efficiency with total peace of mind.
[Book a demo](https://withbenchmark.com/<https:/calendly.com/alec-benchmark/benchmark-intro>)
# Accelerate workflows from first look to final close
Supercharge workflows from deal screening to ongoing portfolio monitoring with secure, best-in-class AI. Navigate the entire deal lifecycle with confidence, leveraging Benchmark’s single source of truth to make faster, smarter decisions at every critical step.
[Book a demo](https://withbenchmark.com/<https:/calendly.com/alec-benchmark/benchmark-intro>)
Who we serve
Private equity
Private credit
Real estate
Growth equity
Venture capital
many more....
## Super charge your investment processes
# Screen OM’s/CIM’s
Extract key deal details instantly
# Generate DDQ reports
Run comprehensive checklists in seconds.
# Surface risks
Identify risks before they escalate.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66ffbc039e91e1eacf266911/67037be4660cee43d90efc18_Portfolio%20\(1\).svg)
# Synthesize portfolio updates
Summarize updates and key data effortlessly.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66ffbc039e91e1eacf266911/67037cbf605b3d43a6255093_Proproetary.svg)
# Create proprietary comps
Compare your deals using your first-part data.
# Extract actionable insights at scale
Uncover insights from any file type.
# Generate a deal score
Score deals based on custom benchmarks.
# Templatize and structure processes
Standardize workflows with custom templates.
[Book a demo](https://withbenchmark.com/<https:/calendly.com/alec-benchmark/benchmark-intro>)
### Enterprise grade security
Benchmark is built to the highest security standards, trusted by leading investment firms to safeguard their most sensitive data.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66ffbc039e91e1eacf266911/6702b7cc9eee002effcd6499_check-circle.svg)
Encrypted in transit and at rest
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66ffbc039e91e1eacf266911/6702b7cc9eee002effcd6499_check-circle.svg)
No training on user data
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66ffbc039e91e1eacf266911/6702b7cc9eee002effcd6499_check-circle.svg)
SOC II Type 2 certified
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66ffbc039e91e1eacf266911/6702ba7999faa14865d51da7_SOC%20Badge.avif)
# Ready to get started?
Unlock your data's full potential. See how Benchmark empowers elite investment firms to make smarter, faster decisions throughout the entire deal lifecycle. Book your personalized demo today
[Book a demo](https://withbenchmark.com/<https:/calendly.com/alec-benchmark/benchmark-intro>)

generated_description:
**Benchmark: The Trusted AI Platform for Investment Firms**

Founded in 2022, Benchmark is already shaking up the investment landscape with its powerful AI platform specifically designed for investment firms. It empowers these firms to navigate the choppy waters of deal-making by streamlining workflows, extracting insights from complex datasets, and improving decision-making across the entire deal lifecycle. Backed by Y Combinator’s W23 batch, Benchmark is headquartered in New York and has a small yet capable team of five, led by Group Partner Jared Friedman.

**What Does Benchmark Do?**

Benchmark provides a comprehensive workspace to ace the diligence process and automate mundane tasks. Its features are built to turn heaps of unstructured data—think Excel sheets, PDFs, and call transcripts—into clear, actionable insights. With capability to handle vast amounts of information, Benchmark allows firms to make smarter, faster decisions by:

- **Screening Deal Materials**: Quickly extract key details from Offering Memorandums (OMs) and Confidential Information Memorandums (CIMs).
- **Generating Due Diligence Questionnaires (DDQs)**: Conduct thorough checklists in mere seconds.
- **Surfacing Risks**: Identify potential issues before they escalate.
- **Synthesizing Portfolio Updates**: Effortlessly summarize important updates.
- **Creating Proprietary Comparisons**: Leverage your own data for insightful deal comparisons.
- **Extracting Insights Across Various Formats**: Process and analyze data at scale, regardless of its file type.

**Security You Can Trust**

In the world of finance, where data sensitivity is paramount, Benchmark takes security seriously. The platform boasts enterprise-grade security standards, ensuring that all data is encrypted both in transit and at rest. Plus, being SOC II Type 2 certified means they meet rigorous security compliance, allowing firms to focus on investment without worrying about data breaches.

**Why It Matters**

For private equity, venture capital, and other financial sectors, Benchmark isn’t just another SaaS tool—it's a transformative approach to deal management. Using AI to verify insights and automate workflows means users can transition smoothly from deal screening to ongoing portfolio monitoring, all while maintaining a high level of accuracy and security.

If you’re in the investment arena and striving to enhance your process efficiency and insight extraction, Benchmark offers a demo to show you how to harness its power for your firm. 

For more information or to book a demo, check out their [website](https://withbenchmark.com/).
